ChangelogDescription:
__**New Features**__

*• Added catchbuddy system, upgrades & more functional.*
*• Added achievements to reach for users.*
*• Added lottery system, purchase tickets and win the jackpot.*

__**Changed Features**__

*• Fixed Catchbuddy to not catch a Pokémon right away.*
*• Remade leaderboard to use username instead of tag (API)*
*• Added rank functions for rank rewards.*
